name: succulently
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
in a way that is pleasantly juicy and good to eat: The ribs were lean, yet succulently tender, and melted in my mouth as I took each bite. The Malbec is a succulently fruity, spicy red wine.
More examplesFewer examplesI opted for the peri-peri chicken, succulently grilled with butter.A low, slow roast in the oven makes the ribs succulently soft.My steak was sliced and prepared succulently.Try the pan-seared tuna, succulently rare in the middle, perched on a golden disc of potato rosti.
